welcome_message.community_vibe: We're all about genuine connections - no networking pitches, no selling, just people making friends. Ages 25-45ish, but vibe matters more than numbers.
welcome_message.questions: Questions? Ask in General or message an admin: Josh (owner), George, or Rana.

icebreaker_questions: What brought you to Boston, and what's surprised you most about living here?
If you could have dinner with any famous Bostonian (past or present), who would it be?
What's your go-to spot in Boston that tourists don't know about?
What hobby or skill are you currently learning or want to learn?
Dunkin' or local coffee shop? (This is a test ğŸ˜„)
What's your favorite season in Boston and why?
If you could only eat at one Boston restaurant for the rest of your life, which would it be?
What's the most Boston thing that's ever happened to you?
Are you a Red Sox, Celtics, Patriots, or Bruins person? Or none of the above?
What's your ideal Boston weekend look like?
What neighborhood do you live in, and what's the best thing about it?
If you had to convince someone to move to Boston in one sentence, what would you say?
What's something you love that most people don't understand?
Are you more of a Cambridge intellectual or a Southie dive bar person?
What's the last thing you got genuinely excited about?
